description:
Frontcountry foodies, rejoice. This compact camp knife set has everything you need to bring your MasterChef skills outside. With a paring knife, a Santoku knife and a serrated knife, your bases are covered no matter what's on the menu. A double-sided cutting board helps you separate meat and veggie prep to prevent cross-contamination, and a soap bottle and dish cloth come in handy for whoever's on dish duty (not the chef!).

  • Stainless steel blades are nicely rockered for slicing, dicing and other food prep
  • Rubber handles provide a safe, non-slip grip
  • Safety covers ensure safe transport and long-lasting sharpness
  • Double-sided cutting board has meat and vegetable icons on opposite sides, helping to prevent cross-contamination
  • Microfibre cleaning cloth has a smooth side for delicate items and a more abrasive side for hard scrubbing
  • Nylon organizing case sports a zip closure and hook-and-loop straps to keep everything in place
  • Includes: 4in. paring knife, 6in. Santoku knife, 6in. serrated knife, a double-sided cutting board, bottle for soap, double-sided dish cloth
name: GSI Santoku Knife Set
